column2: location=Western [[Númenor]], at the mouth of the [[Nunduinë]]
description=Most beautiful of all of Númenor's havens

column1: '''Eldalondë''' ([[Quenya]] ''[[elda]]'' "of the Eldar" + ''[[londë]]'' "land-locked haven") was a haven on the western shores of [[Númenor]], at the mouth of the River [[Nunduinë]].<ref>{{UT
column2: NMap}}</ref>  It was built in the middle of the coast of Númenor's great western bight, between the arms of the wide [[Bay of Eldanna]], in the region known as [[Nísimaldar]], where the [[Fragrant Trees]] grew in high numbers.<ref>{{UT
